subject: Alpine Skiing
Sports Injuries
World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: If the overall World Cup champion Lindsey Vonn needs an operation to repair cartilage damage, she said, she expects to be ready for the next skiing season.
snippet: If the overall World Cup champion Lindsey Vonn needs an operation to repair cartilage damage, she said, she expects to be ready for the next skiing season.
